document_data.name: The Moon's Head Brace
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite organized play/LC/The Rogue of the World|31}}
document_data.mainbody: '''The Moon's Head Brace''' was an alcoholic mixed drink from the city of [[Ravens Bluff]], served at the [[Silvermoon Playhouse]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The Moon's Head Brace was white in color and tasted of wild [[mushroom]]s. It was strong enough to send the imbiber's head spinning.
